title: Zero Risk. Flawless Service.
description: If you are unsatisfied with the course for any reason, you can contact support before watching your fourth unit, and at your option, we will apply your tuition to any Magick.Me course, or send you a full refund. Complimentary and transferred tickets are not eligible for refund. Refund requests must be made within thirty days of purchasing the course. Course is not elible for refund if more than three units have been watched, or if more than thirty days have passed since course purchase.

features.title: 100% Secure Payment
features.description: All purchases are handled by third-party payment processors PayPal and Stripe, the most trusted and secure providers on the Internet. All transactions are fully secure and encrypted.

features.title: 100% Moneyback Guarantee
features.description: You have zero risk in trying out this course. If you decide it isn't for you any time before beginning your fourth unit, within 30 days of purchase, we will refund 100% of your money. Browse our terms here.

features.title: Strict Privacy and Confidentiality
features.description: We will never sell your information, and comply with all data privacy policies around the globe. We will honor all requests to delete your data from our system if desired. Browse our privacy policy here.
